component.name: Nextcloud Password client
component.summary: Manage your Nextcloud Passwords on your desktop

description.p: Nextcloud Password Client is a Flutter based application to manage passwords from the corresponding Nextcloud Passwords app. The focus is set to desktop clients, especially linux.

ul.li: Saving passwords / tags etc. on local hard drive (encrypted)
Save the app with a client password
Work offline after first retrieval of objects
Logging in with or without master password
Navigate trough objects like in web view
See all details of password like in web view
